short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy, search, translate, and generate QR code: the ultimate web extension for text lovers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One of the main tasks that users perform on a website is manipulating text, such as copying, searching, generating QR code or translating it. This extension provides these functions by enabling users to select any text on a website and access the desired feature. Moreover, users can easily deactivate the extension by clicking on the Bypass logo located at the top right corner of their browser.
